name: Color Wizard (TownEater, FreckledFemme)
description:
Color Wizard is an action color matching adventure!

Practice your color magic as the color wizard Zeal and save Chromatica from the evil Scale of Grey!

Controls: Use your mouse to command the color wizard's wand. collect the correct colors with your magic to blast away enemies on the color matching path!

This game was made using G Develop

A collaboration entry from TownEater and FreckledFemme for Mid-Jam 2021

All assets, music, design, etc. made by our dev team.

We may revisit and expand on this in the future. Treat it as a proof of cocept!
